name: Save Your Sanity
description:
Save Your Sanity is 2d Top-down Wave-based shooter. It is great if you have some time to kill and want something a little more complex than Snake or Tetris.

Info all about the game is in the info menu of the game, it has a retro theme and was made mostly for a school project.

Please feel free to leave any constructive criticism below and have fun!

NOTE: This game MAY work for Mac and Linux, but has not been tested. There are no guarantees it will work.
